sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'
import { Dropdown, Icon ,Input, Menu } from 'semantic-ui-react'

const styleLink = document.createElement("link");
styleLink.rel = "stylesheet";
styleLink.href = "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/semantic-ui/dist/semantic.min.css";
document.head.appendChild(styleLink);

export default class MenuExampleSubMenu extends Component {
  state = {}

  handleItemClick = (e, { name }) => this.setState({ activeItem: name })

  render() {
    const { activeItem } = this.state

    return (
      <Menu vertical>
        <Menu.Item>
          <Input placeholder='Search...' />
        </Menu.Item>

        <Menu.Item>
          Home
          <Menu.Menu>
            <Menu.Item
              name='faturamento'
              active={activeItem === 'faturamento'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}
            >
              Gerar Faturamento
            </Menu.Item>
          </Menu.Menu>
        </Menu.Item>

        <Dropdown item text='Faturamento'>
          <Dropdown.Menu>
            <Dropdown.Item 
                icon='edit' 
                text='Faturamento' 
                name='billing'
                active={activeItem === 'billing'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
            <Dropdown.Item 
                icon='file alternate' 
                text='Visualizar Faturamento' 
                name='seeBilling'
                active={activeItem === 'seeBilling'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
            <Dropdown.Item 
                icon='file alternate outline' 
                text='Faturamentos Realizados'
                name='checkBilling'
                active={activeItem === 'checkBilling'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
            <Dropdown.Item 
                icon='percent' 
                text='Consumo Total'
                name='consumeTotal'
                active={activeItem === 'consumeTotal'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
          </Dropdown.Menu>
        </Dropdown>
        <Dropdown item text='Backup Faturamento'>
          <Dropdown.Menu>
            <Dropdown.Item 
                icon='save' 
                text='Realizar Backup' 
                name='backup'
                active={activeItem === 'backup'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
            <Dropdown.Item 
                icon='save outline' 
                text='Backups à Realizar' 
                name='toBackup'
                active={activeItem === 'toBackup'}
                onClick={this.handleItemClick}/>
          </Dropdown.Menu>
        </Dropdown>
        <Menu.Item
              name='logout'
              active={activeItem === 'logout'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}
            >
        <Icon name='power off'/>
          Logout
        </Menu.Item>
      </Menu>
    )
  }
}
